speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0308/2006 ) by Elisabeth Schroedter, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on the application of Directive 96/71/EC on the posting of workers ( 2006/2038(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0308/2006 ) by Elisabeth Schroedter, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on the application of Directive 96/71/EC on the posting of workers ( 2006/2038(INI) ).
